core.name: p5.sound
core.desc: p5.sound extends p5 with Web Audio functionality including audio input, playback, analysis and synthesis.

core.name: p5.accessibility
core.desc: p5.accessibility makes the p5 canvas more accessible to people who are blind and visually impaired.

contributed.name: asciiart
contributed.desc: p5.asciiart is a simple and easy to use image - to - ASCII art converter for p5js.

contributed.name: p5.ble
contributed.desc: A Javascript library that enables communication between BLE devices and p5 sketches.

contributed.name: p5.bots
contributed.desc: With p5.bots you can interact with your Arduino (or other microprocessor) from within the browser. Use sensor data to drive a sketch; use a sketch to drive LEDs, motors, and more!

contributed.name: p5.clickable
contributed.desc: Event driven, easy-to-use button library for p5.js.

contributed.name: p5.cmyk.js
contributed.desc: CMYK ColorSpace

contributed.name: p5.collide2D
contributed.desc: p5.collide2D provides tools for calculating collision detection for 2D geometry with p5.js.

contributed.name: p5.createloop
contributed.desc: Create animation loops with noise and GIF exports in one line of code.

contributed.name: p5.dimensions
contributed.desc: p5.dimensions extends p5.js' vector functions to work in any number of dimensions.

contributed.name: p5.EasyCam
contributed.desc: Simple 3D camera control with inertial pan, zoom, and rotate. Major contributions by Thomas Diewald.

contributed.name: p5.experience
contributed.desc: Extensive library for p5.js that adds additional event-listening functionality for creating canvas-based web applications.

contributed.name: p5.func
contributed.desc: p5.func is a p5 extension that provides new objects and utilities for function generation in the time, frequency, and spatial domains.

contributed.name: p5.geolocation
contributed.desc: p5.geolocation provides techniques for acquiring, watching, calculating, and geofencing user locations for p5.js.

contributed.name: p5.gibber
contributed.desc: p5.gibber provides rapid music sequencing and audio synthesis capabilities.

contributed.name: grafica.js
contributed.desc: grafica.js lets you add simple but highly configurable 2D plots to your p5.js sketches.

contributed.name: p5.gui
contributed.desc: p5.gui generates a graphical user interface for your p5.js sketches.

contributed.name: p5.localmessage
contributed.desc: p5.localmessage provides a simple interface to send messages locally from one sketch to another for easy multi-window sketching!

contributed.name: marching
contributed.desc: Raster to vector conversion, isosurfaces.

contributed.name: mappa
contributed.desc: Mappa provides a set of tools for working with static maps, tile maps, and geo-data. Useful when building geolocation-based visual representations

contributed.name: ml5.js
contributed.desc: ml5.js builds on Tensorflow.js and provides friendly access to machine learning algorithms and models in the browser.

contributed.name: p5.play
contributed.desc: p5.play provides sprites, animations, input and collision functions for games and gamelike applications.

contributed.name: p5.particle
contributed.desc: The Particle and Fountain objects can be used to create data-driven effects that are defined through user structures or JSON input and user-draw functions.

contributed.name: p5.Riso
contributed.desc: p5.Riso is a library for generating files suitable for Risograph printing. It helps turn your sketches into multi-color prints.

contributed.name: rita.js
contributed.desc: RiTa.js provides a set of natural language processing objects for generative literature.

contributed.name: p5.scenemanager
contributed.desc: p5.SceneManager helps you create sketches with multiple states / scenes. Each scene is a like a sketch within the main sketch.

contributed.name: p5.screenPosition
contributed.desc: Adds the screenX and screenY functionality from Processing to P5js.

contributed.name: p5.scribble
contributed.desc: Draw 2D primitives in a sketchy look. Created by Janneck Wullschleger, based on a port of the original Processing library.

contributed.name: p5.serial
contributed.desc: p5.serial enables serial communication between devices that support serial (RS-232) and p5 sketches running in the browser.

contributed.name: Shape5
contributed.desc: Shape5 is a 2D primative library for elementary students who are learning to code for the first time.

contributed.name: p5.shape.js
contributed.desc: A library built to add more simple shapes to the p5.js framework.

contributed.name: p5.speech
contributed.desc: p5.speech provides simple, clear access to the Web Speech and Speech Recognition APIs, allowing for the easy creation of sketches that can talk and listen.

contributed.name: p5.start2d.js
contributed.desc: p5 extension for 2D static art using px, mm, cm or inches

contributed.name: p5.tiledmap
contributed.desc: p5.tiledmap provides drawing and helper functions to include maps in your sketches.

contributed.name: p5.touchgui
contributed.desc: A multi-touch and mouse GUI Library for p5.js.

contributed.name: tramontana
contributed.desc: Tramontana is a platform for easily use many devices (iOS, Android, tramontana Board, ...) to create interactive environments, interactive spaces or just prototype experiences at scale and in space.

contributed.name: vida
contributed.desc: Vida is a simple library that adds camera (or video) based motion detection and blob tracking functionality to p5js.

contributed.name: p5.voronoi
contributed.desc: p5.voronoi provides a set of tools to draw and utilize voronoi diagrams in your p5.js sketches.

contributed.name: p5.3D
contributed.desc: 3D Text and Images in WebGL.
